name: Create ClickUp tasks from Airtable records
description:
Easily create ClickUp tasks from Airtable records and also update the records with the ClickUp task IDs with this template. 
This automation uses this [Airtable template.](https://airtable.com/shrwl9dZcz0IXKtSG/tblPUrxjNeTAIiswO/viwMQK2tQI6KKYkF7?blocks=hide)
